Title: Worst-Case Climate Scenario Would Irreversibly Damage Antarctica, Scientists Warn
Description:

Title: Eric Dane, 'Grey's Anatomy' star and ALS awareness advocate, dies at 53
Description:
Eric Dane, the celebrated actor best known for his roles on "Grey's Anatomy" and "Euphoria" and who later in life became an advocate for ALS awareness, died Thursday.
He was 53.

Description:

in over 40 years say all were married mothers who loved the outdoors.
